item.title: Configure libvirt with openvswitch bridge
item.description:
Create OpenvSwitch bridge

ovs-vsctl add-br br0

Configure libvirt with br0 just created

BRNAME=br0

cat > /tmp/libvirt-net.xml <<EOF
<network>
  <name>${BRNAME}</name>
  <forward mode='bridge'/>
  <bridge name='${BRNAME}'/>
  <virtualport type='openvswitch'/>
</network>
EOF

virsh net-define /tmp/libvirt-net.xml
virsh net-start $BRNAME
virsh net-autostart $BRNAME
